column2: the Mirkwood guard from the "Hobbit" films
image=[[File:The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Elros.jpg
caption="Elros" from ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''

column1: '''Elros''' was a member of the [[Woodland Realm]] and a guard who assisted in the capture of [[Thorin and Company]]. He was also the Keeper of the Keys of [[Thranduil]]'s dungeons. After becoming intoxicated with the king's butler, [[Galion]], Elros loses the keys to the [[hobbit]] [[Bilbo Baggins]]. Later, after [[Thranduil]] had given the order to lock all gates to the kingdom, he informed [[Legolas]] that [[Tauriel]] had left armed with her bow and blade. He was portrayed by the New Zealand actor Robin Kerr.
